modShortDescription: This mod adds in a new offroad vehicle, the SHERP. It requires Grease Monkey level 4 to craft. Has same storage as the 4x4.
modDescription:
This mod adds in a new offroad [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/), the SHERP.

* It requires Grease Monkey level 4 to craft.
* Has same storage as the 4Ã—4, but can carry a total of 4 people.
* Moderate fuel consumption, but holds quite a bit.

## Changelog

Added new engine/horn sounds.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/bdubyah/Mods---A19/tree/master/SHERP)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/bdubyah/Mods---A18/tree/master/SHERP)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11875-bdubyahs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Bdubyah](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/bdubyah/)
